byline.original: By ALAN FEUER and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: Tara Lenich, high-ranking prosecutor in Brooklyn district attorney’s office, is arrested on charges that she used illegal wiretap to spy on police detective and colleague in what investigators are calling love triangle gone wrong.

headline.print_headline: A Brooklyn Prosecutor Is Accused of Illegally Wiretapping a Love Interest
headline.main: Brooklyn Prosecutor Accused of Using Illegal Wiretap to Spy on Love Interest

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Tara Lenich, a high-ranking prosecutor in the district attorney’s office, was arrested and fired after investigators learned she had spied on a police detective and a colleague, an official said....
lead_paragraph: Tara Lenich, a high-ranking prosecutor in the district attorney’s office, was arrested and fired after investigators learned she had spied on a police detective and a colleague, an official said.
